job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Were looking for aspiring and talented developers who want to join our team We will give you the tools and knowledge to build amazing products and lift your career to new heightsbrbrIf you think about coding as craftsmanship have an academic or similar background in software engineering and want to learn how to build incredible software in record speeds youve come to the right placebrbrstronguRequirementsbrustrongulli24 years working as a developerliliBSc Computer Science Mathematics or any related degreerelevant experienceliliAll around player fast selflearning individualliliExperience working in a Linux environmentliliPassion for code craftsmanshipliliSmart problem solverliliLoves getting shit doneliliExperience developing customer facingwebapp products a plusliliExperience in server side Javascript Python or Ruby a plusliul
